description:
ImageAvatar displays an image in a standardized avatar format with consistent sizing and styling.
Use this component when you need to show profile pictures, product images, or any custom image
in an avatar format.
name: Avatar

tags.name: example
example
tags.text:
Background image with custom styling
<AvatarBase
backgroundUrl="https://example.com/image.jpg"
backgroundSize="cover"
backgroundPosition="center"
shape="square"
size={64}
/>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
Avatar with child content
<AvatarBase
size={40}
shape="round"
backgroundColor={theme.gray200}
>
<IconUser size={24} color="gray600" />
</AvatarBase>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
With custom size and shape
<ImageAvatar
imageUrl="https://example.com/profile.jpg"
size={48}
shape="square"
bordered
/>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
Multiple sizes in a user profile
<VStack gap={16} alignItems="center">
<ImageAvatar
imageUrl="https://example.com/profile.jpg"
size={64}
bordered
/>
<Text type="heading">Jane Smith</Text>
<Text type="subheader" color={theme.gray600}>Product Manager</Text>
</VStack>

tags.name: example
example
tags.text:
Custom size with border
<UserAvatar
size={48}
bordered
/>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
Different shapes
<HStack gap={16}>
<UserAvatar shape="round" />
<UserAvatar shape="rounded" />
<UserAvatar shape="square" />
</HStack>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
In a user card
<Card>
<VStack gap={8} alignItems="center" padding={16}>
<UserAvatar size={64} bordered />
<Text type="heading">Guest User</Text>
<Text type="subheader" color={theme.gray600}>Unregistered</Text>
</VStack>
</Card>
